org.pircbotx.hooks

Class CoreHooks

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pircbotx.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      • org.pircbotx.hooks.CoreHooks
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listener

    public class CoreHooks
extends ListenerAdapter
    Several standard IRC client default responses. Any listener that wishes to duplicate functionality should replace CoreHooks in the ListenerManager with a subclass of this class (this way you don't have to duplicate all the functionality).

    Warning: Removing CoreHooks without providing a replacement will produce undesired results like server timeouts due to not responding to pings.

    Author:
    Leon Blakey
    See Also:
    Configuration.Builder.replaceCoreHooksListener(org.pircbotx.hooks.CoreHooks)
